topic.title: Non Medicinal Supply Activity2 - conformance rules

section.p: This template represents equipment supplied to the patient (e.g., pumps, inhalers, wheelchairs). Devices applied to, or placed in, the patient are represented with the Product Instance entry contained within a Procedure Activity Procedure (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.14:2014-06-09)

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-8747, CONF:1098-10509, CONF:1098-32514 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Non Medicinal Supply Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-8749), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32363)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-30277, CONF:1098-30278, CONF:1098-31393)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:1098-8752, CONF:1098-15900)
Conforms to Product Instance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.37)
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-30279)
SHALL conform to Non Medicinal Supply Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8745, R2.0=CONF:1098-8745)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8746, R2.0=CONF:1098-8746)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8748, R2.0=CONF:1098-8748)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-8749), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32363)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:15498, R2.0=CONF:1098-15498)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] quantity (CONF:8751, R2.0=CONF:1098-8751)

SHALL contain [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:8752, CONF:15900)
Conforms to Product Instance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.37)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-30277, CONF:1098-30278, CONF:1098-31393)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:1098-8752, CONF:1098-15900)
Conforms to Product Instance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.37)
effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:16867, R2.0=CONF:1098-16867)

participant with target entry Product Instance SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRD" Product (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) STATIC (CONF:8754, R2.0=CONF:1098-8754)
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-30279)

body.codeblock: <supply xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="SPLY"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="942388165"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime value="20170828"/> <quantity/> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="636203408"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </act> </entryRelationship> </supply>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8747, CONF:10509 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.50"
Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity effectiveTime, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:16867, R2.0=CONF:1098-16867)

Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity participant with target entry Product Instance SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRD" Product (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) STATIC (CONF:8754, R2.0=CONF:1098-8754)
SHALL conform to CDA Supply
Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8745, R2.0=CONF:1098-8745)

Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8746, R2.0=CONF:1098-8746)
Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8748, R2.0=CONF:1098-8748)
Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:8749)
Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:15498, R2.0=CONF:1098-15498)
Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] quantity (CONF:8751, R2.0=CONF:1098-8751)
Consol Non Medicinal Supply Activity SHALL contain [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:8752, CONF:15900) Conforms to Product Instance (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.37)
